verbs.description: finalize (third-person singular simple present finalizes, present participle finalizing, simple past and past participle finalized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To make final or firm; to finish or complete.
examples: As soon as we get the plane tickets, we'll finalize our reservations with the hotel.

entries.meaning: (transitive, computing, programming) To prepare (an object) for garbage collection by calling its finalizer.
